Formula: P = L / n
r = (1 + annualRate/2)^(1/6) - 1
r = (1 + annualRate/2)^(1/13) - 1
r = (1 + annualRate/2)^(1/26) - 1
Monthly = Payment × 26 / 12
Monthly = Payment × 52 / 12
Annual = (propertyTax + condoFees + insurance + maintenance + professionalFees + utilities) × 12
NOI = Annual Rental Income - Annual Operating Expenses
Cap Rate = (NOI / Current Market Value) × 100
Cash Flow = Monthly Rent - Monthly Operating Expenses - Monthly Mortgage Payment
Annual = Monthly Cash Flow × 12
Cash-on-Cash = (Annual Cash Flow / Total Cash Invested) × 100
Balance = Original Amount - Principal Paid to Date
Interest = Sum of interest from next 12 payments
Total Value = Sum of all currentMarketValue
Total Investment = Sum of all totalInvestment
Total Equity = Total Value - Total Mortgage Balance
Portfolio NOI = (Total Monthly Rent × 12) - Total Annual Operating Expenses
Average Cap Rate = Sum of individual Cap Rates / Number of Properties
Portfolio CoC = (Total Annual Cash Flow / Total Investment) × 100
